footer: Get connected with us on social networks!

blog1.subheading: This is a subheading to make people want to read more #1

blog2.subheading: After some minor setbacks and bumps in the road, a new beginning is upon us.
blog2.dialogText1:
New Team

We now have a new team with a new set of skills!
blog2.dialogText2:
New Engine

We've decided to switch from using Unreal Engine 4, to now using Godot 3.1. It may not be looking as flashy or as awesome as Unreal Engine 4, but therefore it's much less ressource demanding than Unreal.

home.headline: Out soon!

first.title: Singleplayer Story
first.text: Play as Carl the Package deliverer in a crazy and colorfull world.

second.title: Singleplayer Arcade
second.text: In this mode, your only objective is to acquire as many points as possible! Climb the leaderboards and get daily rewards based on your rank.

third.title: Multiplayer
third.text: Play with or against your Friends, either to gain points or just for fun!.

home.cta_subheading: or start a discussion in our Forums
